hero.title: Full analysis of the mystery battle Royale
hero.subtitle: Our analyzer helps you find hidden patterns in your game, optimize your strategy, and increase your profits.

features.title: Everything You Need for In-Depth Analysis

feature1.title: Visualize Your Success
feature1.description: Track your balance, ROI, and net profit with interactive and clear charts. Find your strengths and weaknesses.

feature2.title: Analyze Your Income Distribution
feature2.description: Find out which places bring you the main income. Understand whether it is worth fighting for the top 1 or it is more profitable to consistently get into prizes.

feature3.title: Filter Data Like a Pro
feature3.description: Search for tournaments by buy-ins, days of the week, time of day, and places taken. Find your most profitable game sessions.

final_cta.title: Ready to Turn Data into Dollars?
final_cta.subtitle: Create a free account and start analyzing your game today.
